verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3972>Paul<s%> myself <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you by the <S%G4236>meekness<s%> and <S%G1932>gentleness<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> in <S%G4383>presence<s%> am <S%G5011>base<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, but being <S%G548>absent<s%> am <S%G2292>bold<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> you:

But I <S%G1189>beseech<s%> you, that I may not be <S%G2292>bold<s%> when I am <S%G3918>present<s%> with that <S%G4006>confidence,<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G3049>think<s%> to be <S%G5111>bold<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G5100>some,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3049>think<s%> of us as if we <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
For though we <S%G4043>walk<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> we do not <S%G4754>war<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh:<s%>

(For the <S%G3696>weapons<s%> of our <S%G4752>warfare<s%> are not <S%G4559>carnal,<s%> but <S%G1415>mighty<s%> through <S%G2316>God<s%> to the <S%G2506>pulling<s%> <S%G2506>down<s%> of <S%G3794>strong<s%> <S%G3794>holds;<s%>)

<S%G2507>Casting<s%> <S%G2506>down<s%> <S%G3053>imaginations,<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5313>high<s%> <S%G5313>thing<s%> that <S%G1869>exalts<s%> itself <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G163>bringing<s%> into <S%G163>captivity<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3540>thought<s%> to the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

Do you <S%G991>look<s%> <S%G991>on<s%> things <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4383>outward<s%> <S%G4383>appearance?<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G3982>trust<s%> to <S%G1438>himself<s%> that he is <S%G5547>Christ's,<s%> let him of <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3049>think<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> that, as he is <S%G5547>Christ's,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> are we <S%G5547>Christ's.<s%>

For <S%G1437>though<s%> I should <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G4055>more<s%> of our <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> us for <S%G3619>edification,<s%> and not for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2506>destruction,<s%> I should not be <S%G153>ashamed:<s%>
That I may not <S%G1380>seem<s%> as if I would <S%G1629>terrify<s%> you by <S%G1992>letters.<s%>

For his <S%G1992>letters,<s%> <S%G5346>say<s%> they, are <S%G926>weighty<s%> and <S%G2478>powerful;<s%> but his <S%G4983>bodily<s%> <S%G3952>presence<s%> is <S%G770>weak,<s%> and his <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G1848>contemptible.<s%>

Let <S%G3634>such<s%> an one <S%G3049>think<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> that, <S%G5108>such<s%> as we are in <S%G3056>word<s%> by <S%G1992>letters<s%> when we are <S%G548>absent,<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> will we be <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G2041>deed<s%> when we are <S%G3918>present.<s%>

For we <S%G5111>dare<s%> not make <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> of the <S%G1469>number,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4793>compare<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> with <S%G5100>some<s%> that <S%G4921>commend<s%> <S%G1438>themselves:<s%> but they <S%G3354>measuring<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> by <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> and <S%G4793>comparing<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> among <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> are not <S%G4920>wise.<s%>

But we will not <S%G2744>boast<s%> of things <S%G280>without<s%> our <S%G280>measure,<s%> but <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of the <S%G2583>rule<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G3307>distributed<s%> to us, a <S%G3358>measure<s%> to <S%G2185>reach<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to you.

For we <S%G5239>stretch<s%> not <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G5239>beyond<s%> our measure, as though we <S%G2185>reached<s%> not to you: for we are <S%G5348>come<s%> as <S%G891>far<s%> as to you <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G2782>preaching<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

Not <S%G2744>boasting<s%> of things <S%G280>without<s%> our <S%G280>measure,<s%> that is, of <S%G245>other<s%> men's <S%G2873>labors;<s%> but <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1680>hope,<s%> when <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G837>increased,<s%> that we shall be <S%G3170>enlarged<s%> by you <S%G2596>according<s%> to our <S%G2583>rule<s%> <S%G1519>abundantly,<s%>

To <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> in the regions <S%G5238>beyond<s%> you, and not to <S%G2744>boast<s%> in <S%G245>another<s%> <S%G245>man's<s%> <S%G2583>line<s%> of things <S%G2092>made<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to our hand.
But he that <S%G2744>glories,<s%> let him <S%G2744>glory<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
For not he that <S%G4921>commends<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> is <S%G1384>approved,<s%> but <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4921>commends.<s%>
